name: CRDT
description: What is CRDT? CRDT aims to give users a complete crypto banking solution at their fingertips. The team is dedicated in bringing together a diverse crypto ecosystem with a one-stop solution for the transfer of value. CRDT supports fiat, cryptocurrencies, and third-party payment cards issued by banks or others. The New Global Crypto Banking System CRDT (or CRDTpay) is a free, reliable, and end-to-end crypto payments technology solution. It aims to allow users to leverage a one-stop, complete crypto banking solution that is similar to operating one's own Visa or Mastercard network.
